âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Enables browsing the modern web on historical browsers â€¢ Renders browser viewport into images â€¢ Uses JavaScript application on the client browser to display images
ðŸ“– Summary: Browservice is a web proxy server that allows users to browse modern websites on historical browsers. It achieves this by rendering the browser viewport into images and displaying them on the client browser using a JavaScript application. The project provides up-to-date builds with the latest Chromium versions and offers various command-line options for customization and control.
